faq_question: I’m experiencing hardware/software issues, what should I do?
faq_answer:
For any hardware or software issues, you should open a ticket on the myITS platform.
https://endava.service-now.com/myits/

faq_question: How can I find another work colleague’s desk?
faq_answer:
You should check out the Employee Locator at this link.
https://eel.endava.com

faq_question: I have an idea for a new tag for MyEndava. How can I propose it?
faq_answer: A new tag can be proposed from the “+” icon on the Tags tab.

faq_question: How can I use an office printer?
faq_answer:
The printer can be set up using the tutorial found on the “HOW TO GUIDES” page on the myITS portal.
https://endava.service-now.com/myits/knowledge_allend.do

faq_question: How can I book a meeting room?
faq_answer: You can use Outlook to book a meeting room from the list of available rooms.

faq_question: Where can I find more information regarding my Endava career?
faq_answer: Extra information regarding your employment details, career coach, career map, organisational structure and other can be found on the Career Development System portal.
